uvi.description:
drm/sched: Avoid data corruptions

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.13.3 by commit 50d7e03ad487cc45fc85164a299b945a41756ac0. For more details please see the references link.
